author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dale Capital To Issue 5.3 Mln Shares At 1.90 Rupees Per Share
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Dale Capital Group Ltd:
* TO ISSUE 5.3 MILLION SHARES AT MUR 1.90 PER SHARE, AS CONSIDERATION FOR REMAINING 30% SHAREHOLDING IN LINKED TO AFRICA MANAGEMENT SERVICES
* PLACED 30.4 MILLION SHARES WITH TARGETED INVESTORS AT AN ISSUE PRICE OF MUR 1.90 PER SHARE FOLLOWING A PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF SHARES
* PROCEEDS FROM PRIVATE PLACEMENT WILL BE USED TO SETTLE LOANS FROM EXISTING SHAREHOLDERS Source: bit.ly/2GLBo88 Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
